name: Omega Tower
description:
Omega Tower is a small tower defense game mixed with rogue-lite elements!
Pick a loadout with unique abilities, Upgrades for your towers, and create unique synergies.
But most importantly, try to defend your core!

loadouts:

In Omega Tower, you will have to choose and pick your loadout before each run. Each loadout is centered around a specific gameplay and has 4 unique abilities.

towers:

Every few waves, you will be able to place towers to defend your core.
Each tower type has its own stats (range, firerate, damage, aoe damage, etc)

Tower and Global Upgrades

A tower can have up to 5 Upgrades allowing you to create unique synergies between them. From a sniper tower firing every 0.2 seconds radioactive projectiles, to a rocket tower firing 4 rockets at once with a disc saw, everything is possible !
Global Upgrade are applied to the terrain or your loadout.
Some loadouts even have some unique global upgrades !
It's up to you to discover them !

progression:

With each run or achievement you complete, you will be able to buy new content: tower upgrades, global upgrades, and even loadouts!
